name: The House With the Doors: The Tale that took a Day
name_original: The House With the Doors: The Tale that took a Day
description:
The House With the Doors is an interactive narrative in which you, the player, explore a house. It really is that simple. Throughout your tour of the house, you will choose which rooms to explore and how you react to them. Get ready for your trip through The House With the Doors!

(PLEASE NOTE: to reset your progress, open the game in a new tab. Sorry. Twine's save system is weird. Currently searching for a solution for easier progress reset.)
